definitions.title: vb. Pi.
definitions.body: beguile, deal treacherously with (NH in deriv.; Targum [[רְמָא]] Pa.; Buhl:Lex cp. Ar. ramay VI. be sluggish, backward (of wound), become putrid, corrupt);—Pf. 3 ms. [[רִמָּה]] Pr 26:19, sf. [[רִמָּנִי]] 2Sa 19:27; 2 ms. sf. [[רִמִּיתָנִי]] Ge 29:25, 1Sa 28:12; 2 fs. sf. [[דִמִּיתִנִי]] 1Sa 19:17, etc.; Inf. cstr. sf. [[לְרַמּוֹתַנִי]] 1Ch 12:18 (van d. H. v:1Ch 12:17);—be-guile, deceive, mislead, acc. Pers., Ge 29:25 (E), Jos 9:22 (JE), 1Sa 28:12, 2Sa 19:27, Pr 26:19; deal treacherously with, betray, acc. pers., 1Sa 19:17, La 1:19, + [[לְחָרַי]] 1Ch 12:17.
